vote.title: Authorize an increase in the development loan agreement with Cypress Creek Montfort Drive, LP, or its affiliate in the amount of $7,646,555.00, for the development of Cypress Creek Apartment Homes at Montfort, a 168-unit mixed income multifamily complex located at 14119 Montfort Drive, Dallas, Texas 75254 - Not to exceed $7,646,555.00, from $4,100,000.00 to $11,746,555.00 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant Funds Disaster Recovery
